"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c028076368722767490200#post_54c028076368722767490200

you can set preferences

basically steam sends you a notification when someone is gonna watch your game, you can allow them to or not

or set it so anyone can watch your game at any given time
